message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the time pressure we're both under.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be fairer to each other.  This offer considers the time pressure we both face.
Bob, let's be realistic. Time is ticking and the value is decreasing. This offer is still favorable for you considering the inflation.
Alice, we're getting closer, but your offers aren't reflecting the urgency of the situation.  This is a fair split considering the rapid devaluation.
Bob, we're running out of time! This offer is a good compromise. Let's agree before the money shrinks even further.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We need to settle this now. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution. Let's not throw away our money!
